title: Fragments, ca. 1785
medium:
Medium: cotton
Techinque: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 92 x 92.5 cm (36 1/4 x 36 7/16 in.)
Warp x Weft: 145.5 x 56 cm (57 5/16 x 22 1/16 in.)
Warp x Weft: 58.5 x 35.5 cm (23 1/16 x 14 in.)
Repeat H: 104 cm (40 15/16 in.)
description: A sleeping Endymion woken by the goddess Diana  is combined with the deer from Diana's hunt  and an assortment of bucolic scenes including a bird stealing a sheep. In red on white.
